byline.contributor: Raphael Minder reported from Barcelona, Spain, and Alison Smale from Berlin. Reporting was contributed by Rachel Donadio, Dan Bilefsky and Nicola Clark from Paris; Austin Ramzy from Hong Kong; Melissa Eddy from Berlin; Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia; Liam Stack from New York; Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem; and Momoko Abe from Tokyo.
byline.original: By RAPHAEL MINDER and ALISON SMALE

abstract: Family and friends mourn deaths of two opera singers, newlyweds, three American citizens and many others as details emerge regarding victims of Germanwings jet crash in French Alps.
lead_paragraph: The dead, from at least 15 countries, included an American mother and daughter and the wife of a prominent Catalan politician.

headline.main: Among Germanwings Crash Victims, Opera Singers and Newlyweds
headline.print_headline: Among Victims of the Crash, Opera Singers and Newlyweds

snippet: The dead, from at least 15 countries, included an American mother and daughter and the wife of a prominent Catalan politician.
